trans-unit.source: Determines the alignment of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.

Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is to be anchored toward the left or top end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, depending on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> orientation.

If the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> is `Yes`, items marked as <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Left"></xref> are aligned to the right side of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.

Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is to be anchored toward the right or bottom end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, depending on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> orientation.

If the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> is `Yes`, items marked as <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right"></xref> are aligned to the left side of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
